title: Problem with patching, Scanning | game
body:
Hello, so im home for the weekend and I havent updated league on this computer for a good 2 months. It has windows 7. I think the downloading is done, as im able to log in but not actually play a game. The client is trying to "SCANNING | GAME", but it keeps failing, says its some problem with riots servers and its preventing me from patching.
Would be very happy if I could get help asap as im only home for 2 days.
Thanks

replies.body: If it's getting stuck at scanning game files, then you might have a setting or anti-virus that's blocking game files from being read.  Start off with each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure access is being permitted.

I am am having the same problem!  My computer is windows 10, however.  Any and all advice appreciated. 
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}
